underscorgan/community_management.title: Community reports
underscorgan/community_management.description: This set of scripts collates daily reports on our responsibilities as the stewards of supported modules.

puppetlabs/dependency_checker.title: dependency-checker
puppetlabs/dependency_checker.description: The dependency-checker tool validates dependencies in metadata.json files in Puppet modules or YAML files containing arrays of Puppet modules against the latest published versions on the Puppet Forge.

camptocamp/facterdb.title: facterdb
camptocamp/facterdb.description: A Database of OS facts provided by Facter.

puppetlabs/iac.title: IAC Blog
puppetlabs/iac.excerpt: This is the site you’re reading right now.

puppetlabs/puppet_litmus.title: Litmus
puppetlabs/puppet_litmus.description: Litmus provides a simple command line tool for Puppet content creators, to enable both simple and complex test deployments against specifically configured target systems.
puppetlabs/puppet_litmus.excerpt: To work with a litmus module, see the quickstart guide. To port a beaker test suite to litmus, see the porting guide.

puppetlabs/litmusimage.title: Litmus Images
puppetlabs/litmusimage.description: This repository creates docker image files, for testing puppet modules with services with Puppet Litmus.

voxpupuli/metadata-json-lint.title: metadata-json-lint
voxpupuli/metadata-json-lint.description: Tool to check the validity of Puppet metadata.json files.

puppetlabs/pdk-docker.title: PDK Dockerfile
puppetlabs/pdk-docker.description: Official Puppet Development Kit (PDK) Docker Image.

puppetlabs/pdk-planning.title: PDK Planning
puppetlabs/pdk-planning.description: Public planning repository for the PDK project.
puppetlabs/pdk-planning.excerpt: This repo has some automation enabled to pull various ticket systems together onto a single board. Have a look at the projects on Github to see where everything’s at.

puppetlabs/pdk-templates.title: PDK Templates
puppetlabs/pdk-templates.description: The templates used by the PDK to create new modules and other objects.

puppetlabs/pdk-vanagon.title: PDK Packaging
puppetlabs/pdk-vanagon.description: This project contains all the code to create native packages of the PDK for all supported platforms.

puppetlabs/pdk.title: Puppet Development Kit
puppetlabs/pdk.description: Command line tool for generating and testing modules.

puppetlabs/pdksync.title: PDKSync
puppetlabs/pdksync.description: PDKSync is an efficient way to run a command against the various Puppet module repositories that you manage — keeping them up-to-date with the changes made to PDK.

puppetlabs/puppet-approved.title: Puppet Approved script
puppetlabs/puppet-approved.description: A small script to test for the easy Puppet Approved criteria.

puppetlabs/puppet-lint-i18n.title: puppet-lint-i18n plugin
puppetlabs/puppet-lint-i18n.description: check and decorate puppet code for internationalization.

rodjek/puppet-lint.title: puppet-lint
rodjek/puppet-lint.description: Check that your Puppet manifests conform to the style guide.

puppetlabs/puppet-strings.title: Puppet Strings
puppetlabs/puppet-strings.description: Puppet Strings generates documentation for Puppet code and extensions written in Puppet and Ruby. Strings processes code and YARD-style code comments to create documentation in HTML, Markdown, or JSON formats.

voxpupuli/puppet-syntax.title: Puppet::Syntax
voxpupuli/puppet-syntax.description: Syntax checks for Puppet manifests and templates.

puppetlabs/puppet_pot_generator.title: puppet_pot_generator
puppetlabs/puppet_pot_generator.description: Library / Gem to generate a gettext style pot file from puppet code.

puppetlabs/puppetlabs_spec_helper.title: Puppet Labs Spec Helper
puppetlabs/puppetlabs_spec_helper.description: A set of shared spec helpers specific to Puppetlabs projects.

puppetlabs/puppet-resource_api.title: Resource API
puppetlabs/puppet-resource_api.description: This library provides a simple way to write new native resources.

mcanevet/rspec-puppet-facts.title: rspec-puppet-facts
mcanevet/rspec-puppet-facts.description: Simplify your unit tests by looping on every supported Operating System and populating facts.

rodjek/rspec-puppet.title: rspec-puppet
rodjek/rspec-puppet.description: RSpec tests for your Puppet manifests.

puppetlabs/rubocop-i18n.title: Rubocop::I18n
puppetlabs/rubocop-i18n.description: A set of cops for detecting strings that need i18n decoration in your project.

puppetlabs/ruby-pwsh.title: PowerShell Gem (ruby-pwsh)
puppetlabs/ruby-pwsh.description: This gem enables you to execute PowerShell from within ruby without having to instantiate and tear down a PowerShell process for each command called.
